channel.title: (¯`·._.·Devolution v8 new generation.·._.·´¯)
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][u][b]Devolution v8[/b][/u][/size][/center] coded by me -Bakatool yes i am back had to change my user due to loss of password & forgott pass to my email
[B][U]About the server[/U][/B] - i have been working testing to do something new - i have tryed to make a dodian rebuild
Did i acomplish this yes i did
[B][U]Features important things.[/U][/B] Drop logs Trade logs chat logs ban logs private chat logs mute logs command logs invalid names ip's connections Reports
[U][B]Features.[/B][/U] Ancient Teleports Yanille Taverly seers dragons Catherby fishing guild legends guild Gnome agility
Full NPC'S same as dodian Full drops like dodian Working Gnome agility Full working doors same as dodian Full working membership (with number of days left)
[B][U]Skills[/U][/B] Thieving 87% cooking 80% fishing 84% firemaking 97% woodcutting 98% farming 0% mining 60% runecrafting 40% smithing 70% crafting 60% fletching 97% agility 50%
[B][U]Added[/U][/B] skill tab menu's
[U][B]game option tab[/B][/U] in dodian there was
switch magic yes no
and it's the same in devolution v8
[B][U][COLOR="Black"]PICTURES off the teleports.[/COLOR][/U][/B] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yvjaky.jpg[/img]
Here is the download link. [URL=http://uppit.com/v/1pceg8f6]click here to download from uppit[/url] [URL=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4IMIPI3B]click here to download from megaupload[/url]
Thanks -Bakatool
